name: OS Fingerprint Test
description: Tests IP header fingerprinting: Windows baseline, Linux botnet attack. Holon should detect concentration in ip_id=0, dscp, and TTL band shifts.

phases.name: warmup_windows
phases.description: 30s baseline: Windows clients (TTL=128, random IP ID, DF set)

phases.name: linux_attack
phases.description: 15s attack: Linux VPS botnet (TTL=64, sequential IP ID, DF set)

phases.name: spoofed_attack
phases.description: 15s attack: Spoofed traffic (IP ID=0, DF clear, TTL=64)

phases.name: dscp_attack
phases.description: 15s attack: Spoofed with DSCP=46 (EF/voice marking, unusual for game traffic)
